4679.quoteText:
<li>Information you have shared with others (e.g., Reviews, forum postings) may continue to be publicly visible on the Airbnb Platform, even after your Airbnb Account is cancelled.
However, attribution of such information to you will be removed.
4679.title: Airbnb will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after account deletion

tosdr.case: This service will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after erasure of personal information

6398.quoteText: the Airbnb Platform currently does not respond to a “Do Not Track” signal in the HTTP header from your browser or mobile application
6398.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

6399.quoteText: we require certain information such as your first name, last name
6399.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

tosdr.case: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

6405.quoteText: If you choose to decline cookies, some parts of the Airbnb Platform may not work as intended or may not work at all.
6405.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

6406.quoteText: Third parties may also use such tracking technologies to serve ads that they believe are most likely to be of interest to you and measure the effectiveness of their ads both on the Airbnb Platform and on other websites and online services.
6406.title: This service allows tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including targeted advertising.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

6407.quoteText: we work with a number of analytics partners, including Google Analytics
6407.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

6408.quoteText: If Airbnb undertakes or is involved in any merger, acquisition, reorganization, sale of assets, bankruptcy, or insolvency event, then we may sell, transfer or share some or all of our assets, including your information
6408.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

6410.quoteText: We may retain some of your personal information as necessary for our legitimate business interests
6410.title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

tosdr.case: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

6411.title: You cannot delete your account of this service

tosdr.case: You cannot delete your account of this service
tosdr.tldr: You can not delete your account. You can only beg AirBnB to do it for you:  "If you want to permanently close and delete your account, contact us." In that case AirBnB will insist that you to provide further personal information to "We will verify your identity for security purposes before accepting the deletion request." which is up to them to accept or insist more proof for their records. So effectively, you can not delete your account from this service. This happened to me and the account still exists as I refused to keep sending them more and more documents just close the account while the original reason for closing the account was them violating my privacy.

9576.quoteText: We provide some information in our Help Center to help you identify some of the obligations that apply to you.
9576.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

tosdr.case: The service refers users to external documents for more information

9577.quoteText: 1.3 While we may help facilitate the resolution of disputes, Airbnb has no control over and does not guarantee (i) the existence, quality, safety, suitability, or legality of any Listings or Host Services,
9577.title: This services gives no guarantee regarding quality

tosdr.case: This services gives no guarantee regarding quality

9578.quoteText: (ii) the truth or accuracy of any Listing descriptions, Ratings, Reviews, or other Member Content (as defined below),
9578.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

tosdr.case: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

9580.quoteText: Airbnb is not responsible or liable for the availability or accuracy of such Third-Party Services, or the content, products, or services available from such Third-Party Services. Links to such Third-Party Services are not an endorsement by Airbnb of such Third-Party Services.
9580.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

tosdr.case: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

9582.quoteText: 1.7 Due to the nature of the Internet, Airbnb cannot guarantee the continuous and uninterrupted availability and accessibility of the Airbnb Platform.
9582.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

9583.quoteText: 4.1 You must register an account ("Airbnb Account") to access and use certain features of the Airbnb Platform, such as publishing or booking a Listing.
9583.title: You must create an account before you can access the service's pricing information

tosdr.case: You must create an account to use this service

9584.quoteText: You may not assign or otherwise transfer your Airbnb Account to another party.
9584.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

tosdr.case: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

9585.quoteText: 15.3 Without limiting our rights specified below, Airbnb may terminate this Agreement for convenience at any time by giving you thirty (30) days' notice via email to your registered email address.
9585.title: The service gives 30 days of notice before closing your account

tosdr.case: The service gives 30 days of notice before closing your account

9591.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms
